name: ext_R5_VisionPrescription_le_prism
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.prism from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/VisionPrescription|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Allows for adjustment on two axis.
element.comment: `VisionPrescription.dispense.prism` maps to R2 `VisionPrescription.dispense.prism`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

element.definition: Amount of prism to compensate for eye alignment in fractional units.
element.comment: `VisionPrescription.dispense.prism` maps to R2 `VisionPrescription.dispense.prism`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
